posts.title: Stationary
posts.content: We are thrilled to announce a looking for a professional stationary team in our company.
posts.requirements: Has to have minimum 5 years of experience in stationary management, excellent communication skills, good equipment and a proven track record in organization.

posts.title: Cafeteria
posts.content: We are thrilled to announce a brand new opening in our company.
posts.requirements: Has to have minimum 5 years of experience in cafeteria management, excellent management skills, good equipment and a proven track record in cleanliness.
